post.text: Proud of you Donald Trump Jr. - you were great! Keep up the incredible work at the Trump Org. Because of you, Ivanka, Eric, and Tiffany - I have this opportunity to give back. It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Dylan
comment.text: It's so AWESOME to see such a great family working together for the greater good!! You have something great, what's better, you APPRECIATE that u have something great!!! You truly are an inspiration to me!!!

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Fuxk this clown and fuxk white privileges

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: Yeah! I can't understand the vulgarity!

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Dylan , won't be surprised if Donald Trump Jr will be running for president one day. you're disgusting .
